name: Karlson run
description:
Karlson Run is an endless-runner fan-game about "Karlson". you will run through roads, rooftops, and prisons to reach that sweet milk at the end. but beware, dozens of robots, yellow dudes, and red bois want to stop you. With the assistance of your guns and skills (and also billy), Take them down!

NOTE: *This is just a fan game, Karlson's original creator is Dani.

                 *The android and browser versions aren't as efficient as the windows version, if you want the best experience possible please play the windows version

Controls: -W / Up: Jump          -S / Down: Slide          -A / Left: move to the left

-D / right: move to the right          -Left Click: Fire with your gun

Objective: Reach to the milk to unlock the next level

Make sure you wishlist Karlson on steam now GAMER

I will post a devlog on youtube about this game soon, so make sure you subscribe! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvHyRF4fwSuQYy6_sHKwlBg
